alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Barnwell (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 7:32PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Barnwell and southwestern Aiken Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 731 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Clearwater to 6 miles west of Barton. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Aiken, North Augusta, Barnwell, Savannah River Site, Aiken Mall, Clearwater, Williston, Blackville, New Ellenton, Jackson, Citizens Park, Gloverville, Barnwell State Park, Aiken State Park, Burnettown, Hilda, Snelling, Kline, Elko and Windsor. This includes the following highways... Interstate 520 in Georgia near mile marker 15. Interstate 520 in South Carolina between mile markers 16 and 17. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
